articles.author: Ed Carruthers
articles.title: Lionel Messi injury scare played down after he didn't train with Argentina squad on Thursday - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 35-year-old starred as the South American side progressed to the final of the 2022 World Cup with a convincing 3-0 win over Croatia on Tuesday night, with the winger scoring first from the spot.
articles.content:
Injury concerns over Lionel Messi's fitness have been played down, after the seven-time Ballon d'Or winner did not join the rest of the Argentina squad in training on Thursday. 
The 35-year-old star… [+2455 chars]
